about_the_game:
Hentai ChessKnight - Endless Mode can load images from the Web for continuous game play.

Gameplay Guide


Victory Condition: You need to finish the Puzzle.
How to Play: Play the Knight as the Knight in Chess and turn all the color block off.

Function Keys


Keyboard P: One key finish
Keyboard S: Emergency avoidance (the background image turns white and you can continue to play)
Keyboard N: Next level

Game Features


Pleasing Pictures
Soothing Music

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity, Mature, or Sexual Content.

All characters built into this game are over the age of 18.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
